article.Heading: GST revenue collections slowed down in August Vs July: Sources
article.Summary: CNBC-TV18 learn from sources that the goods and services tax (GST) revenue collections have slowed down in August. Watch accompanying video of CNBC-TV18’s Timsy Jaipuria for an update on the same.
article.Body:
CNBC-TV18 learn from sources that the goods and services tax (GST) revenue collections have slowed down in August.

Watch accompanying video of CNBC-TV18’s Timsy Jaipuria for an update on the same.
